form.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked several questions about specific hobbies which he/she participated in for 6 months or longer. If the respondent has participated in one or more of the hobbies, he/she is asked additional questions about when the hobby started, how long it lasted, the overall time period, and the number of hours per week or month.

question.questionText: Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_last_year_coded)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_total_years)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_total_years_coded)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_hours_quantity)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Hobbies using glues? (hobby_glue_hours_frequency)
Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_last_year_coded)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_total_years)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_total_years_coded)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_hours_quantity)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Hobbies involving soldering, such as jewelry making or stained glass? (hobby_soldering_hours_frequency)
Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_last_year_coded)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_total_years)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_total_years_coded)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_hours_quantity)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Developing Photographs? (hobby_photograph_hours_frequency)
Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_last_year_coded)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_total_years)
Overall, for how many years were you involved in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_total_years_coded)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_hours_quantity)
On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Oil painting? (hobby_painting_hours_frequency)
Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Woodworking or refinishing furniture? (hobby_woodworking_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Woodworking or refinishing furniture? (hobby_woodworking_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Woodworking or refinishing furniture? (hobby_woodworking_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Woodworking or refinishing furniture? (hobby_woodworking_last_year_coded)

On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Woodworking or refinishing furniture? (hobby_woodworking_hours_frequency)
Have you ever participated for 6 months or longer in Ceramics or pottery making? (hobby_ceramics_participated)
In what year were you first involved in Ceramics or pottery making? (hobby_ceramics_first_year)
In what year were you last involved in Ceramics or pottery making? (hobby_ceramics_last_year)
In what year were you last involved in Ceramics or pottery making? (hobby_ceramics_last_year_coded)

On average, about how many hours per week, month, or year have you participated in Other activities involving the use of chemicals? (hobby_chemicals_hours_frequency)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked several questions about specific hobbies which he/she participated in for 6 months or longer. If the respondent has participated in one or more of the hobbies, he/she is asked additional questions about when the hobby started, how long it lasted, the overall time period, and the number of hours per week or month.

form.longName: PhenX PX060701 - Current Environmental Tobacco Smoke Exposure
form.preferredDefinition: These questions ask about smoking at the respondent's home and at work. If smoking occurs at the home, a household roster is utilized to document which person smokes and the number of cigarettes smoked per day. The respondent is also asked if he/she smells smoke at work and if so, the number of hours per day the smoke is present.

question.questionText: (At Home) Does anyone who lives here smoke cigarettes, cigars, or pipes anywhere inside this home? (smoking_at_home_0)
Who smokes? PROBE: Anyone else? SELECT NAMES FROM HOUSEHOLD ROSTER. (smoking_person01)
How is this person related to your? (person01_relationship)
How many cigarettes per day {do you/does PERSON} usually smoke anywhere inside the home? (smoking_cigarette_quantity_preson01)
How many cigarettes per day {do you/does PERSON} usually smoke anywhere inside the home? (smoking_cigarette_quantity_coded_person01)

(At Work) At this job or business, that is at {EMPLOYER} as a(n) {OCCUPATION}, how many hours per day can {you/SP} smell the smoke from other people's cigarettes, cigars, and/or pipes? (hours_smell_smoking_at_work_person01)

At this job or business, that is at {EMPLOYER} as a(n) {OCCUPATION}, how many hours per day can {you/SP} smell the smoke from other people's cigarettes, cigars, and/or pipes? (hours_smell_smoking_at_work_coded_person01)
Who smokes? PROBE: Anyone else? SELECT NAMES FROM HOUSEHOLD ROSTER. (smoking_person2)
How is this person related to your? (person2_relationship)
How many cigarettes per day {do you/does PERSON} usually smoke anywhere inside the home? (smoking_cigarette_quantity_preson2)
How many cigarettes per day {do you/does PERSON} usually smoke anywhere inside the home? (smoking_cigarette_quantity_coded_person2)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These questions ask about smoking at the respondent's home and at work. If smoking occurs at the home, a household roster is utilized to document which person smokes and the number of cigarettes smoked per day. The respondent is also asked if he/she smells smoke at work and if so, the number of hours per day the smoke is present.

form.preferredDefinition: The respondent's mother is asked if the child attended day care and/or preschool. If the child attended either the parent is asked the dates attended and the number of hours per week.

question.questionText: Has (CHILD) attended day care outside the home? (day_care)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the first attendance? (day_care_begin_month_1)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the first attendance? (day_care_begin_year_1)
In what month did (CHILD) end the first attendance? (day_care_end_month_1)
In what year did (CHILD) end the first attendance? (day_care_end_year_1)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the second attendance? (day_care_begin_month_2)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the second attendance? (day_care_begin_year_2)
In what month did (CHILD) end the second attendance? (day_care_end_month_2)
In what year did (CHILD) end the second attendance? (day_care_end_year_2)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the third attendance? (day_care_begin_month_3)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the third attendance? (day_care_begin_year_3)
In what month did (CHILD) end the third attendance? (day_care_end_month_3)
In what year did (CHILD) end the third attendance? (day_care_end_year_3)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the first day care? (day_care_hours_1)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the second day care? (day_care_hours_2)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the third day care? (day_care_hours_3)
Has (CHILD) attended preschool? (preschool)
CHILD'S AGE AT REFERENCE DATE (preschool_child_age)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the first attendance? (preschool_begin_month_1)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the first attendance? (preschool_begin_year_1)
In what month did (CHILD) end the first attendance? (preschool_end_month_1)
In what year did (CHILD) end the first attendance? (preschool_end_year_1)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the second attendance? (preschool_begin_month_2)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the second attendance? (preschool_begin_year_2)
In what month did (CHILD) end the second attendance? (preschool_end_month_2)
In what year did (CHILD) end the second attendance? (preschool_end_year_2)
In what month did (CHILD) begin the third attendance? (preschool_begin_month_3)
In what year did (CHILD) begin the third attendance? (preschool_begin_year_3)
In what month did (CHILD) end the third attendance? (preschool_end_month_3)
In what year did (CHILD) end the third attendance? (preschool_end_year_3)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the first preschool? (preschool_hours_1)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the second preschool? (preschool_hours_2)
About how many hours per week (did/does) (CHILD) attend the third preschool? (preschool_hours_3)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The respondent's mother is asked if the child attended day care and/or preschool. If the child attended either the parent is asked the dates attended and the number of hours per week.

form.longName: PhenX PX061001 - History Of Being Breast Fed
form.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked whether or not his/her mother breastfed him/her.

question.questionText: Did your mother breastfeed you? (being_breast_fed)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked whether or not his/her mother breastfed him/her.

form.longName: PhenX PX061101 - Air Contaminants In The Home Environment
form.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked several questions about interior home/apartment improvements-such as professional cleaning, major renovations, new carpeting, and painting in the last year. The date that the renovation occurred is also asked. Short-term exposure questions are also included such as personal activities in and around the home in the last 48 hours.

module.longName: Air Contaminants In The Home Environment
module.preferredDefinition: Air Contaminants In The Home Environment

question.questionText: In the past year has there been a major renovation to this house or apartment, such as adding a room, putting up or taking down a wall, replacing windows, or refinishing floors? (house_renovation)
What type of renovation? (renovation_type)
When was the last renovation? (renovation_date)
Within the last six months were rugs, drapes or furniture professionally cleaned? (rug_drapes_furniture_cleaned)
Were they cleaned inside the house? (rug_drapes_furniture_inside)
When were they cleaned? (rug_drapes_furniture_date)
When were they cleaned? (rug_drapes_furniture_date_coded)
What items were cleaned? (rug_drapes_furniture_items)
In the past year, was the inside of this house or apartment painted? (house_apartment_painted)
When was the last time? (painting_date)
In how many rooms? (painting_room_quantity)
In the past year were new carpets or rugs installed? (carpet_rug_installed)
When was the installation? (carpet_rug_date)
In how many rooms? (carpet_rug_room_quantity)
Did you go to the dry cleaners during the past week? (dry_cleaner_visit)
Did you bring home any items from the cleaners that were drycleaned during the past week? (dry_cleaned_item)
Have you used Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids) or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_paint_solvent)
Did you handle Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids) yourself? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_paint_solvent_self)
How many hours did you handle Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids) yourself? (exposure_paint_solvent_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids) yourself? (exposure_paint_solvent_self_minutes)
Were you near somebody else who handled Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids)? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_paint_solvent_nearby)
How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids)? (exposure_paint_solvent_nearby_hours)
How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Paints or solvents (paint thinners and removers, typewriter corrective fluids)? (exposure_paint_solvent_nearby_minutes)

Have you used Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_glue_adhesive)
Did you handle Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents yourself? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_glue_adhesive_self)
How many hours did you handle Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents yourself? (exposure_glue_adhesive_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents yourself? (exposure_glue_adhesive_self_minutes)

Were you near somebody else who handled Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_glue_adhesive_nearby)

How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents? (exposure_glue_adhesive_nearby_hours)

How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Glues and adhesives, such as contact cement, super glues, and aerosol adhesives that contain chemical solvents? (exposure_glue_adhesive_nearby_minutes)
Have you used Gasoline lawn mower or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_gasoline_mower)
Did you handle Gasoline lawn mower yourself? (exposure_gasoline_mower_self)
How many hours did you handle Gasoline lawn mower yourself? (exposure_gasoline_mower_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Gasoline lawn mower yourself? (exposure_gasoline_mower_self_minutes)
Were you near somebody else who handled Gasoline lawn mower? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_gasoline_mower_nearby)
How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Gasoline lawn mower? (exposure_gasoline_mower_nearby_hours)
How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Gasoline lawn mower? (exposure_gasoline_mower_nearby_minutes)
Have you used Chain saw or other gasoline equipment or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_gasoline_equipment)
Did you handle Chain saw or other gasoline equipment yourself? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_self)
How many hours did you handle Chain saw or other gasoline equipment yourself? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Chain saw or other gasoline equipment yourself? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_self_minutes)
Were you near somebody else who handled Chain saw or other gasoline equipment? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_nearby)
How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Chain saw or other gasoline equipment? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_nearby_hours)
How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Chain saw or other gasoline equipment? (exposure_gasoline_equipment_nearby_minutes)
Have you used Sander and/or saw or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_sander_saw)
Did you handle Sander and/or saw yourself? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_sander_saw_self)
How many hours did you handle Sander and/or saw yourself? (exposure_sander_saw_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Sander and/or saw yourself? (exposure_sander_saw_self_minutes)
Were you near somebody else who handled Sander and/or saw? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_sander_saw_nearby)
How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Sander and/or saw? (exposure_sander_saw_nearby_hours)
How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Sander and/or saw? (exposure_sander_saw_nearby_minutes)
Have you used Pesticides sprayed or has someone used near you in the last 48 hours? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed)
Did you handle Pesticides sprayed yourself? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_self)
How many hours did you handle Pesticides sprayed yourself? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_self_hours)
How many minutes did you handle Pesticides sprayed yourself? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_self_minutes)
Were you near somebody else who handled Pesticides sprayed? If Yes, for how long? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_nearby)
How many hours were you near somebody else who handled Pesticides sprayed? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_nearby_hours)
How many minutes were you near somebody else who handled Pesticides sprayed? (exposure_pesticides_sprayed_nearby_minutes)

protocol.longName: Air Contaminants in the Home Environment
protocol.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked several questions about interior home/apartment improvements-such as professional cleaning, major renovations, new carpeting, and painting in the last year. The date that the renovation occurred is also asked. Short-term exposure questions are also included such as personal activities in and around the home in the last 48 hours.

form.longName: PhenX PX061201 - Dust Collection Vacuum Bag
form.preferredDefinition: The respondent is mailed instructions and a sealable plastic bag to collect dust from his/her vacuum cleaner. The respondent is asked to collect the dust from his/her vacuum cleaner and mail it to the laboratory. At the laboratory, the sample is sieved, weighed, and analyzed for environmental contaminants.

question.questionText: Time vacuum bag was emptied (time_of_collection)
Vacuum dust bag image (dust_collection_vacuum)
Number of Days Vacuum Has Been Used Since Changing Out the Bag or Emptying the Collection Chamber (number_days_used)
Weight of dust collected (sample_weight)

The respondent is asked to collect the dust from his/her vacuum cleaner and mail it to the laboratory. At the laboratory, the sample is sieved, weighed, and analyzed for environmental contaminants.

form.preferredDefinition: The interviewer asks the respondent several questions about sunburn, use of tanning booths and sunlamps, and time spent outdoors in the mid-day sun.

question.questionText: The following questions focus on your complexion and your exposure to the sun. (ultraviolet_intro)
If you spent an hour in the midday sun for the first time without sunscreen, which of these reactions best describes what would happen to your skin: (skin_reaction)

validValue.meaningText: A mild sunburn that becomes a tan
validValue.description: A mild sunburn that becomes a tan

question.questionText: Did you ever get a blistering sunburn? (blistering_sunburn_ever)
How many years old were you the first time you got a blistering sunburn? (first_sunburn_age_exact)
How old were you the first time you got a blistering sunburn? (first_sunburn_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (first_sunburn_age_estimate)
How many years old were you the last time you got a blistering sunburn? (last_sunburn_age_exact)
How old were you the last time you got a blistering sunburn? (last_sunburn_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (last_sunburn_age_estimate)
How many blistering sunburns have you gotten in your life? (sunburn_times_exact)
How many blistering sunburns have you gotten in your life? (sunburn_times_exact_coded)
About how many? (sunburn_times_estimate)
Did you ever get a skin rash from sun exposure? (skin_rash_ever)
How many years old were you the first time you got a skin rash from sun exposure? (first_skin_rash_age_exact)
How old were you the first time you got a skin rash from sun exposure? (first_skin_rash_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (first_skin_rash_age_estimate)
How many years old were you the last time you got a skin rash from sun exposure? (last_skin_rash_age_exact)
How old were you the last time you got a skin rash from sun exposure? (last_skin_rash_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (last_skin_rash_age_estimate)
How many times you have gotten a skin rash from sun exposure in your life? (skin_rash_times_exact)
How many times you have gotten a skin rash from sun exposure in your life? (skin_rash_times_exact_coded)
About how many? (skin_rash_times_estimate)
Have you ever used a sunlamp? (use_sunlamp_ever)
How many years old were you the first time you used a sunlamp? (first_sunlamp_age_exact)
How old were you the first time you used a sunlamp? (first_sunlamp_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (first_sunlamp_age_estimate)
How old were you the last time you used a sunlamp? (last_sunlamp_age_exact)
How old were you the last time you used a sunlamp? (last_sunlamp_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (last_sunlamp_age_estimate)
How many times have you used a sunlamp in your life? (sunlamp_times_exact)
How many times have you used a sunlamp in your life? (sunlamp_times_exact_coded)
About how many? (sunlamp_times_estimate)
Have you ever used a tanning booth? (tanning_booth_ever)
How many years old were you the first time you used a tanning booth? (first_tanning_booth_age_exact)
How old were you the first time you used a tanning booth? (first_tanning_booth_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (first_tanning_booth_age_estimate)
How many years old were you the last time you used a tanning booth? (last_tanning_booth_age_exact)
How old were you the last time you used a tanning booth? (last_tanning_booth_age_exact_coded)
About how old were you? (last_tanning_booth_age_estimate)
How many times have you used a tanning booth in your life? (tanning_booth_times_exact)
How many times have you used a tanning booth in your life? (tanning_booth_times_exact_coded)
About how many? (tanning_booth_times_estimate)

Please answer the following questions about your exposure to the sun at different periods of your life. When we refer to "midday sun," it means those hours when the sun is more than halfway up in the sky. For most of the United States, that would be between the hours of 10 AM and 4PM Daylight Savings Time. (weekday_weekend_sun_intro)
On a typical weekday in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your teens? (weekday_sun_hours_teens)
On a typical weekday in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your twenties? (weekday_sun_hours_twenties)
On a typical weekday in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your thirties? (weekday_sun_hours_thirties)
On a typical weekday in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun in the past ten years? (weekday_sun_hours_last_decade)
On a typical weekend day in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your teens? (weekend_sun_hours_teens)
On a typical weekend day in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your twenties? (weekend_sun_hours_twenties)
On a typical weekend day in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun (when you were) in your thirties? (weekend_sun_hours_thirties)
On a typical weekend day in the summer, about how many hours did you generally spend in the midday sun in the past ten years? (weekend_sun_hours_last_decade)
When you were in your teens, for how many months a year did you usually have a tan? (tan_months_teens)
When you were in your twenties, for how many months a year did you usually have a tan? (tan_months_twenties)
When you were in your thirties, for how many months a year did you usually have a tan? (tan_months_thirties)
In the past ten years, for how many months a year did you usually have a tan? (tan_months_last_decade)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The interviewer asks the respondent several questions about sunburn, use of tanning booths and sunlamps, and time spent outdoors in the mid-day sun.

form.longName: PhenX PX061401 - Plastic Exposures At Work And Home
form.preferredDefinition: The respondent answers questions about the interior surfaces in his/her residence and workplace.

module.longName: Plastic Exposures At Work And Home
module.preferredDefinition: Plastic Exposures At Work And Home

question.questionText: Has there been renovation or repairs in your workspace because of moisture damage? (workspace_renovation_moisture)
What is the floor material in your workspace? (workspace_floor_material)
If "other," what is the floor material in your workspace? (workspace_floor_material_other)
Is the wall material of your work space textile (cloth, jute, etc.) (textile_wall_material)

validValue.meaningText: yes, less than half of the wall surfaces
validValue.description: yes, less than half of the wall surfaces

validValue.meaningText: yes, at least half of the wall surfaces
